((Koj and Inu went to the CF because they live there in the lower levels of 
docking bay 10. I didn't know the cameras were in the wall so I guess i'm on 
tape. ?1 would access to most systems in any maximal base on this planet. 
For reasons I don't want to state at this time but Yans knows hold your word 
Yan. Also I have to state my work on the ark to you because? Not to be rude 
but I just want to know I can't mess it up anymore.))

Recap of past 4 days.

::Day 1::
::?3 and ?5::
setup a defense grid and base traps.

::the rest spend the day reviewing the plans::

::Day2::
::3?::
Was on patrol all day.

::The Rest spend time pulling out metal and trying to get the lower part of 
the Frame.

::Day3::
Repair day 2 and start fusing what they can together.

::Day4::
Today Sent Koj back to CF to get supplies.
Once supplies were delivered started attaching Bulk head screws.
